jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Title: Software Engineer

Location: Vashi, Navi Mumbai

Company:

Morningstar is a leading provider of independent investment research in North America, Europe, Australia, and Asia. We offer a wide variety of products and solutions that serve market participants of all kinds, including individual and institutional investors in public and private capital markets, financial advisors, asset managers, retirement plan providers and sponsors, and issuers of securities. Morningstar India has been a Great Place to Work-certified company for the past eight consecutive years.

Role: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Software Engineer to join our Wealth - Individual Investor team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in .NET development, proficiency with AWS, and exposure to AI technologies. Experience with Node.js is also desired. This role will involve designing, developing, and maintaining software solutions that enhance our individual investor products.

Shift - General

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performance software solutions using .NET and AWS.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.

Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.

Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure our solutions remain cutting-edge.

Qualifications:

Minimum of 5 years of experience in software development with a strong focus on .NET technologies.

Proficiency with AWS services and infrastructure.

Experience with front-end and back-end development using Vue.js and Node.js.

Strong understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices.

Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Proficient with Agile development methodologies.

Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.

Exposure to AI and machine learning technologies.

Experience with Node.js.

Experience in the financial services industry is a plus.

Why Join Us:

Be part of a mission-driven organization that empowers investor success.

Work with a talented and passionate team.

Opportunities for professional growth and development.

Competitive compensation and benefits package.

Morningstar is an equal opportunity employer.

jobs.title: Java Back End Developer
jobs.description:
Position Purpose

Provide a brief description of the overall purpose of the position, why this position exists and how it will contribute in achieving the teams goal.

Position for Java backend expert / tech lead (Java, spring, hibernate, oracle sql, JEE, microservice, Liquibase etc). is required to work on ADM assignments i.e. development, maintenance, unit testing and contribute in regression testing. He/she would need to contribute in proposing backend designs, perform design review, and present to technical architecture and technical lead community, and implement solution in MyCreditApp. He/she would need to mentor the team in on java backend technologies, take knowledge sharing session, do peer programming and help team to improve their skills.

Responsibilities

Direct Responsibilities

# Study user requirement, develop specifications, design, code program, test and implement systems in line with Group standards and regulatory requirements IN ORDER TO meet user (business) requirements.


# Adapt to current architecture and development of backend with latest technical stack


# Coaching & Mentoring, Peer programming

# Follow all the best practices and quality process of the project.

# Contribute in stringent code reviews and maintaining the quality of the application.


# Handle development/design projects using core Java, Oracle, Spring, Hibernate, Web services (REST), DevOps tools (Jenkins) , Build Tool (Maven)


# Ensure thorough Unit test case coverage (Junit)


# Perform Estimation and Planning and Proactive Status reporting to the management at both Paris/India and ISPL ends


Contributing Responsibilities

# Contribute to hiring by conducting technical interviews in ISPL

Technical & Behavioral Competencies

# Tech skills -

Java (version 15 or above)
Spring
Hibernate
Sql, Liquibase
Micro services
bitbucket / Git or other version control tool
Junit
REST API
DevSecOps tools e.g. Jenkins, Kubernetes (Nice to Have)


# Develop programs in optimal manner without compromising core architecture/design


# Make thorough impact analysis – impact study, possible regressions, Better unit test coverage


# Contribute in creating technical documentation and maintain in repository


# Work on the technologies efficiently and produce best fit deliveries

jobs.title: Senior Backend Developer
jobs.description:
1. Job Title: Senior Backend Developer Cloud Native (Java/Spring Boot)


Job Summary:


We are looking for an experienced Senior Backend Developer to be a key
part of our next-generation cloud-native Home Loan Platform. You will
design, develop, and maintain robust and scalable backend services
using Java and Spring Boot. This role requires hands-on experience
with distributed systems, event-driven architecture, and modern cloud
practices (GCP, AWS), along with deep expertise in building secure and
resilient APIs.


Key Responsibilities:


Design and develop microservices using Java 21+ and Spring Boot.
Build and expose RESTful APIs for integration with cloud/on-prem applications.
Implement reliable messaging using Confluent Kafka.
Integrate with YugabyteDB for distributed, highly available data storage.
Leverage DAPR for sidecar-based microservice building blocks like
service invocation, pub-sub, secrets, and state management.
Integrate long-running business workflows using Temporal.
Ensure code quality via unit testing, integration testing, code
reviews, and CI/CD pipelines.
Optimize performance, scalability, and security of backend services.
Work in Agile teams and collaborate with DevOps, QA, and other developers.
Document systems and contribute to API specs and design documentation.


Required Skills:


6+ years of experience in backend development.
Strong hands-on experience in Java, Spring Boot, REST APIs.
Good understanding of cloud-native development (12-factor app) principles.
Experience with Kafka for event streaming.
Exposure to YugabyteDB or similar distributed SQL/NoSQL DBs
(Cassandra, CockroachDB, etc.).
Familiarity with DAPR, Temporal is a plus.
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines.
Familiarity with both GCP and AWS is preferred.
Strong understanding of security, logging, tracing, and monitoring in
microservices.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.

Should be good in Observability and metrics. Have knowledge on Prometheus.

jobs.title: Associate/Sr. Associate Backend Developer
jobs.description:
Role Contour : The Backend Developer is responsible for system functionality. Its function is to integrate the application with all necessary systems and services and provide a clean and easy-to-use API in the frontend. Although his work is often hidden from the user, he has full responsibility for the functionality, performance and scalability of the application. Knows how to write clean, modern APIs, integrate with legacy systems, and work with databases.




Accountabilities :

• Design and develop the business logic and product backend systems.

• Work closely with frontend developers to design and develop functional, performance and complete APIs.

• Decrypt existing enterprise software systems and connect application to applicable data sources.

• Write unit, integration, and performance tests. Develop automation tools and continuous integration pipelines for daily tasks.

• Develop at high quality, with good documentation and with efficient code.

• Challenge ideas and opinions to avoid errors and inefficient solutions.




Qualifications and Skills :

• 3+ years of experience as backend developer with experience in Java, Node, Scala, etc., significant API expertise for large-scale apps and performance optimization.

• Deep knowledge of programming principles and object-oriented engineering (e.g., SOLID, clean architecture).

• Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB).

• Integration experience with JavaScript frameworks (React, Angular JS)

• Effective testing abilities (unit, integration, API)




Agile/Digital Experience :

• Strong understanding of agile methodologies

• Experience as a developer in a cross-functional agile team




Individual Skills :

• Strong communication skills with the ability to communicate complex nical concepts and align the organization on decisions

• Strong problem-solving skills to quickly process complex information and present it clearly and effectively

• Utilize team collaboration to create innovative solutions efficiently




Mindsets and Behaviors :

• Passionate about technology and excited about the impact of emerging/disruptive technologies

• Wants to unleash the internal entrepreneur and work in an environment that fosters entrepreneurial minds

• Believes in the culture of transparency and trust and open to learning new ideas.

jobs.title: SW Developer Backend
jobs.description:
A. Backend Development
Design, develop, and maintain backend systems using Node.js, Strapi,
PostgreSQL, Socket.io, and Redis.
Build and optimize APIs for seamless integration with frontend technologies
(Next.js, React.js).
Implement real-time communication features using Socket.io.
Ensure database efficiency and security with PostgreSQL.
Utilize Redis for caching and improving application performance.
B. Game Development
Develop and maintain game backend logic using Phaser.js and Node.js.
Implement multiplayer functionality and real-time game interactions.
Optimize game performance and ensure scalability.
C. Blockchain Smart Contracts
Write and deploy smart contracts using Solidity for NFT rewards and
transaction security.
Integrate Ethereum and Polygon Blockchain for decentralized reward
distribution and NFT marketplace functionality.
Ensure the security and efficiency of blockchain transactions and smart
contracts.
Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate blockchain features into the
user interface.
D. System Integration Security
Integrate backend systems with frontend technologies to ensure seamless
functionality.
Implement security best practices to protect data and transactions.
Conduct regular code reviews and performance optimizations.
E. Collaboration Support
Work closely with frontend developers, game developers, and other team
members to ensure cohesive development efforts.
Provide technical support and troubleshooting for backend systems.
Document code and development processes for future reference.
F. Deliverables
1. Backend Systems
Fully functional and optimized backend systems using Node.js, Strapi,
PostgreSQL, Socket.io, and Redis.
2. APIs
Well-documented and efficient APIs for integration with frontend
technologies.
3. Game Backend
Robust backend logic for game development using Phaser.js and Node.js.
4. Smart Contracts
Deployed smart contracts for NFT rewards and transaction security using
Solidity.
5. Blockchain Integration
Integrated Ethereum and Polygon Blockchain for decentralized reward
distribution and NFT marketplace.
6. Documentation
Comprehensive documentation for all backend systems, APIs, and blockchain
integrations.



A. Backend Development
Design, develop, and maintain backend systems using Node.js, Strapi,
PostgreSQL, Socket.io, and Redis.
Build and optimize APIs for seamless integration with frontend technologie

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer AI/ML Backend Developer
jobs.description:
Senior Software Engineer-AI/ML Backend Developer


Position Description
Company Profile:
Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest independent IT and business consulting services firms in the world. With 94,000 consultants and professionals across the globe, CGI delivers an end-to-end portfolio of capabilities, from strategic IT and business consulting to systems integration, managed IT and business process services and intellectual property solutions. CGI works with clients through a local relationship model complemented by a global delivery network that helps clients digitally transform their organizations and accelerate results. CGI Fiscal 2024 reported revenue is CA$14.68 billion and CGI shares are listed on the TSX (GIB.A) and the NYSE (GIB). Learn more at cgi.com.


Position: Senior Software Engineer-AI/ML Backend Developer
Experience: 4-6 years
Category: Software Development/ Engineering
Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad/Chennai/Pune/Mumbai
Shift Timing-General Shift
Position ID: J0725-0150
Employment Type: Full Time


Education Qualification: Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field or higher with minimum 4 years of relevant experience.


We are seeking an experienced AI/ML Backend Developer to join our dynamic technology team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in developing and deploying machine learning models, implementing AI algorithms, and managing backend systems and integrations. You will play a key role in shaping the future of our technology by integrating cutting-edge AI/ML techniques into scalable backend solutions.


Your future duties and responsibilities
Develop, optimize, and maintain backend services for AI/ML applications.
- Implement and deploy machine learning models to production environments.
- Collaborate closely with data scientists and frontend engineers to ensure seamless integration of backend APIs and services.
- Monitor and improve the performance, reliability, and scalability of existing AI/ML services.
- Design and implement robust data pipelines and data processing workflows.
- Identify and solve performance bottlenecks and optimize AI/ML algorithms for production.
- Stay current with emerging AI/ML technologies and frameworks to recommend and implement improvements.


Required qualifications to be successful in this role
Must-have Skills-Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn


- Machine learning frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn
- Backend development frameworks: Flask, Django, FastAPI
- Cloud technologies: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
- Containerization and orchestration: Docker, Kubernetes
- Data management and pipeline tools: Apache Kafka, Apache Airflow, Spark
- Database technologies: SQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL), NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Cassandra)
- Vector Databases: Pinecone, Milvus, Weaviate
- Version Control: Git
- Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD


Minimum of 4 years of experience developing backend systems, specifically in AI/ML contexts.
- Proven experience in deploying machine learning models and AI-driven applications in production.
- Solid understanding of machine learning concepts, algorithms, and deep learning techniques.
- Proficiency in writing efficient, maintainable, and scalable backend code.
- Experience working with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.


Good to have Skills-Java (preferred), Scala (optional)




Please share your updated profile on mimansha.varma@cgi.com or apply through CGI career page against J0725-0147 Job ID .

jobs.title: Software Developer (Backend Engineer)
jobs.description:
The role of software developer (backend) is to work closely on development projects with the product team on various insurance products and features to drive growth. The key skills required are Python/Go/Java. The job would include continuous collaboration with engineers, product managers and quality team and hence ability and desire to work in a team is a must.

Must be proficient in at least one programming language, preferred Python/Go/Java.
Must have good debugging and communication skills.
Should be a team player.
At least 2+ years of experience in product based organizations as a software developer.
Must have working knowledge with backend and frontend development.
Knowledge of software architecture and design principles.
Familiarity with databases (e.g. SQL), backend-services (e. g. RESTful).
Must know hands-on work experience on Django or similar backend framework.
Must have knowledge of GIT.

Candidate Profile:

Working knowledge of deploying applications on Cloud infrastructure like AWS.
Exposure to micro services architecture is an added advantage.
Experience with AWS Lambda, Elastic Search, Kafka, Celery adds an advantage.
Collaboration in open-source projects will add brownie points to your profile.

jobs.title: Backend Developer (Python + Flask/FastAPI + Cloud)
jobs.description:
Xoriant is hiring backend developers




Job Description:

Backend Developer (Python + Flask/FastAPI + Cloud)

Backend Developer with strong expertise in Python, Flask/FastAPI, and REST API development, along with experience in cloud platforms (AWS/Azure).




Responsibilities:

Build and maintain backend services and REST APIs using Flask/FastAPI.
Work with message queues/topics (Kafka, RabbitMQ, Azure Service Bus, AWS SQS/SNS).
Orchestrate payloads from multiple endpoints and deliver to downstream systems.
Deploy and scale applications on AWS/Azure.
Follow SDLC best practices (Agile, CI/CD, testing, documentation).

Required Skills:

3 to 7 years of backend development experience with Python.
Strong expertise in Flask or FastAPI.
Proven experience in REST API design and development.
Hands-on experience with cloud services (AWS/Azure).
Experience with message queues/event-driven systems.



Nice to Have:

Hands on experience in any UI technology
SQL/NoSQL databases

Monitoring/logging tools (ELK, Grafana, CloudWatch, Azure Monitor)
